Footer.description: Handcrafted leather goods from Bali. Rooted in tradition, refined for modern living.

Hero.title: Crafted by Hand. Made to Last.
Hero.description: Premium leather goods handcrafted in Bali — timeless pieces designed to grow with you.

About.title: Where Craft Meets Character
About.p1: Born in the heart of Bali, Mebayu blends traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design. Each piece is carefully shaped by skilled local artisans using full-grain genuine leather.
About.p2: We create more than accessories — we craft companions. Pieces that soften, age beautifully, and carry the marks of your journey.

Products.title: The Collection
Products.description: Clean silhouettes. Honest materials. Designed with intention and built to endure.

Cta.title: Carry Something Meaningful
Cta.description: Explore handcrafted leather essentials that balance simplicity, function, and quiet elegance.

Craftsmanship.title: Crafted by Hand
Craftsmanship.description: Every piece begins with carefully selected leather and is shaped through time, patience, and skilled hands.
Craftsmanship.story: We source premium genuine leather from trusted local suppliers and use traditional vegetable tanning methods that allow the material to age beautifully. Each stitch is done by hand, ensuring strength, character, and a finish that carries the mark of the artisan behind it.

Products.title: Our Products
Products.description: Discover handcrafted leather pieces made with timeless craftsmanship.
